# Dropout Hacks

> Kolkata's First Spider-Verse Themed Hackathon.

Join Kolkata's ultimate Spider-Verse themed hackathon on March 28-29, 2026. Code, build, innovate and save the multiverse.

## Essential Information

- **Date:** March 28-29, 2026
- **Location:** Kolkata, West Bengal, India
- **Registration:** [Apply on Devfolio](https://dropouthacks.devfolio.co/)
- **Discord:** [Join Community](https://discord.gg/hmU2TssPf9)

## Key Pages

- [Home](https://dropouthacks.tech/) - Overview, Timeline, Tracks, and Sponsors.
- [Team](https://dropouthacks.tech/team) - Meet the organisers and team behind Dropout Hacks.
- [Rules](https://dropouthacks.tech/rules) - Hackathon rules, code of conduct, and guidelines.
- [Volunteer](https://dropouthacks.tech/volunteer) - Opportunities to help organise and manage the event.

## FAQ

- **Is it free?** Yes, registration and attendance are completely free.
- **Who can join?** Students and tech enthusiasts from all backgrounds.
- **Prizes?** Amazing prizes, internship opportunities, and networking with industry experts.

For more details, visit our official website at https://dropouthacks.tech
